EsperIO 4.9.0 API Documentation

Esper IO API

See:
          Description

Packages
com.espertech.esperio This package contains adapter framework classes applicable to multiple adapter implementations.
com.espertech.esperio.amqp AMQP input and output adapter classes.
com.espertech.esperio.csv CSV input adapter classes for reading comma-separated-value formatted data and for CSV-based simulatation of events streams
com.espertech.esperio.dataflow  
com.espertech.esperio.db DB Adapter plug-in classes for use in Esper configuration and adapter API.
com.espertech.esperio.db.config DB adapter classes for configuration.
com.espertech.esperio.db.core DB adapter core classes.
com.espertech.esperio.ext CSV Adapter utility classes.
com.espertech.esperio.http Socket Adapter plug-in classes for use in Esper configuration and adapter API.
com.espertech.esperio.http.config HTTP adapter configuration classes.
com.espertech.esperio.http.core Socket Adapter core classes.
com.espertech.esperio.jms Spring-JMS Adapter and marshalling.
com.espertech.esperio.representation.axiom Axiom event representation.
com.espertech.esperio.socket HTTP Adapter plug-in classes for use in Esper configuration and adapter API.
com.espertech.esperio.socket.config Socket Adapter configuration classes.
com.espertech.esperio.socket.core HTTP Adapter plug-in classes for use in Esper configuration and adapter API.

 

Esper IO API

This documentation concentrates upon the Esper IO API.
Full Esper documentation may be found at esper.codehaus.org.
